CustomField.formula: IF(Is_Deleted_in_NS__c, "Deleted", IF( ROUND(Amount_Invoiced__c,2)=0, "Paid In Full", IF( ROUND(Outstanding_Bln__c,2) <= 0, IF( OR(ROUND(amt_credited__c,0) >= ROUND(Amount_Invoiced__c,0), amt_credited__c + 0.99 >= Amount_Invoiced__c), "Credited in Full", IF( ROUND(amt_credited__c,2) > 0, "Paid but Partially Credited", "Paid In Full" ) ), IF( ROUND(amt_credited__c,2) > 0, "Partially Credited", IF( ROUND(Amt_Paid__c,2) > 0 , "Partially Paid", "Open" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status (New)
